en.title: How do you want to respond?
en.detailsText1: The divorce will go ahead if you and the respondent let the divorce proceed, and the court agrees to grant a divorce.
en.detailsText2: You can let the divorce proceed, but still object to paying the divorce costs (if they've been claimed against you). You can do this on the next page.
en.detailsText3: If you disagree with the divorce application and choose to 'defend', you will have to pay a fee of £{{ feesDefendDivorce }} and submit another form. You may also have to go to a hearing with a judge.
en.action: Choose one of the following options.

errors.required: Select ‘I will let the application for divorce proceed’ if you do not want to defend the divorce

proceed.heading: I will let the application for divorce proceed
proceed.summary: Choose this option if you don't want to try to prevent the divorce (you don't intend to 'defend' it).
proceed.answer: I will let the application for divorce proceed and won’t try to prevent it (I don’t intend to ‘defend’ it)

defend.heading: I disagree with the application for divorce
defend.summary: Choose this option if you disagree that the divorce should be based on the allegation of adultery (you intend to 'defend' it).
defend.answer: I don’t accept the allegations made in the application (I intend to defend it).
